```{r setup}
# load libraries
library(knitr)
library(lubridate)
library(tidyverse)

# set default document options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.width = 8,
                      fig.asp = 0.618,
                      echo = TRUE,
                      warning = FALSE)

# set random seed
set.seed(1965)
```

# Load Data

```{r}
scores <-
  read_csv('data/fin_resp_data.csv',
           col_types = cols(.default = col_character(),
                            composite_year = col_integer(),
                            composite_score = col_double(),
                            unitid = col_integer()))

scores
```
